Eco Friendly Sightseeing

All Oslo Tours

Explore Oslo

Our highlights tour is an excellent choice if it is your first time in Oslo or you want to see all the most popular attractions the city has to offer"

Book now

Hipster Oslo

On our Hipster Oslo tour we travel from the city center to the hipster area of Grünerløkka. From free thinkers and artists to street art and parklands Grünerløkka has something for everyone!

Book now

Historic Oslo

The tour start where our Hipster tour ends by the historic Akerselva river. From here we will travel through the city centre to Akershus Fortess. he fortress has been at the centre of the nation's growth and development for 700 years, and it is now very popular as a culture arena

Book now

Architecture tour

From the fjord-waves lapping against Snøhetta’s new opera, to the iconic Holmenkollen ski jumping hill, high above the sea, Oslo offers a unique mixture of breathtaking landscapes and architectural highlights.

Book now

Nature Tour

Oslo is one of the greenest cities in the world. On this tour we will show you some of the most spectacular parts in and around Oslo.

Book now

Winter Tour

During the winter months we have a specially designed tour for travellers who want to experience the history of wintersports in Norway as well as christmas markets and more.

Book now

Private Tour

if you are traveling with a group or just want a tailor made tour this is the tour for you. we can acommodate groups from 2-14 people. If you have special attractions you want to see, just tell us and we can ajust the tour accordingly!

Book now
